Name: Bulbasaur
PkdxEntry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

Name: Ivysaur
PkdxEntry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

Name: Venusaur
PkdxEntry: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

Name: Charmander
PkdxEntry: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

Name: Charmeleon
PkdxEntry: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

Name: Charizard
PkdxEntry: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

Name: Squirtle
PkdxEntry: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

Name: Wartortle
PkdxEntry: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

Name: Blastoise
PkdxEntry: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

Name: Caterpie
PkdxEntry: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

Name: Metapod
PkdxEntry: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

Name: Butterfree
PkdxEntry: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

Name: Weedle
PkdxEntry: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

Name: Kakuna
PkdxEntry: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

Name: Beedrill
PkdxEntry: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

Name: Pidgey
PkdxEntry: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

Name: Pidgeotto
PkdxEntry: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

Name: Pidgeot
PkdxEntry: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

Name: Rattata
PkdxEntry: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

Name: Ratcate
PkdxEntry: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

Name: Spearow
PkdxEntry: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

Name: Fearow
PkdxEntry: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

Name: Ekans
PkdxEntry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

Name: Arbok
PkdxEntry: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

Name: Pikachu
PkdxEntry: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

Name: Raichu
PkdxEntry: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

Name: Sandshrew
PkdxEntry: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

Name: Sandslash
PkdxEntry: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

Name: Nidoran♀
PkdxEntry: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

Name: Nidorina
PkdxEntry: The female’s horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

Name: Nidoqueen
PkdxEntry: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

Name: Nidoran♂
PkdxEntry: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

Name: Nidorino
PkdxEntry: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

Name: Nidoking
PkdxEntry: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey’s bones.

Name: Clefairy
PkdxEntry: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

Name: Clefable
PkdxEntry: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

Name: Vulpix
PkdxEntry: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

Name: Ninetails
PkdxEntry: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

Name: Jigglypuff
PkdxEntry: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

Name: Wigglytuff
PkdxEntry: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

Name: Zubat
PkdxEntry: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

Name: Golbat
PkdxEntry: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

Name: Oddish
PkdxEntry: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

Name: Gloom
PkdxEntry: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn’t drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

Name: Vileplume
PkdxEntry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

Name: Paras
PkdxEntry: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

Name: Parasect
PkdxEntry: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

Name: Venonat
PkdxEntry: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

Name: Venomoth
PkdxEntry: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

Name: Diglett
PkdxEntry: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

Name: Dugtrio
PkdxEntry: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

Name: Meowth
PkdxEntry: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

Name: Persian
PkdxEntry: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

Name: Psyduck
PkdxEntry: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

Name: Golduck
PkdxEntry: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

Name: Mankey
PkdxEntry: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

Name: Primeape
PkdxEntry: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

Name: Growlithe
PkdxEntry: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

Name: Arcanine
PkdxEntry: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

Name: Poliwag
PkdxEntry: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

Name: Poliwhirl
PkdxEntry: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

Name: Poliwrath
PkdxEntry: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

Name: Abra
PkdxEntry: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

Name: Kadabra
PkdxEntry: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

Name: Alakazam
PkdxEntry: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

Name: Machop
PkdxEntry: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

Name: Machoke
PkdxEntry: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

Name: Machamp
PkdxEntry: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

Name: Bellsprout
PkdxEntry: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

Name: Weepinbell
PkdxEntry: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

Name: Victreebel
PkdxEntry: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

Name: Tentacool
PkdxEntry: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

Name: Tentacruel
PkdxEntry: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

Name: Geodude
PkdxEntry: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

Name: Graveler
PkdxEntry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

Name: Golem
PkdxEntry: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

Name: Ponyta
PkdxEntry: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

Name: Rapidash
PkdxEntry: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

Name: Slowpoke
PkdxEntry: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

Name: Slowbro
PkdxEntry: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE’s tail is said to feed on the host’s left over scraps.

Name: Magnemite
PkdxEntry: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

Name: Magneton
PkdxEntry: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

Name: Farfetch'd
PkdxEntry: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

Name: Doduo
PkdxEntry: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

Name: Dodrio
PkdxEntry: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

Name: Seel
PkdxEntry: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

Name: Dewgong
PkdxEntry: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

Name: Grimer
PkdxEntry: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

Name: Muk
PkdxEntry: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

Name: Shellder
PkdxEntry: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

Name: Cloyster
PkdxEntry: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

Name: Gastly
PkdxEntry: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

Name: Haunter
PkdxEntry: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

Name: Gengar
PkdxEntry: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

Name: Onix
PkdxEntry: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

Name: Drowzee
PkdxEntry: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

Name: Hypno
PkdxEntry: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

Name: Krabby
PkdxEntry: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

Name: Kingler
PkdxEntry: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

Name: Voltorb
PkdxEntry: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

Name: Electrode
PkdxEntry: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

Name: Exeggcute
PkdxEntry: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

Name: Exeggutor
PkdxEntry: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

Name: Cubone
PkdxEntry: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON’s real face.

Name: Marowak
PkdxEntry: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

Name: Hitmonlee
PkdxEntry: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

Name: Hitmonchan
PkdxEntry: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

Name: Lickitung
PkdxEntry: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

Name: Koffing
PkdxEntry: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

Name: Weezing
PkdxEntry: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

Name: Rhyhorn
PkdxEntry: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

Name: Rhydon
PkdxEntry: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

Name: Chansey
PkdxEntry: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

Name: Tangela
PkdxEntry: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.

Name: Kangaskhan
PkdxEntry: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother’s protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

Name: Horsea
PkdxEntry: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

Name: Seadra
PkdxEntry: Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

Name: Goldeen
PkdxEntry: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

Name: Seaking
PkdxEntry: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

Name: Staryu
PkdxEntry: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

Name: Starmie
PkdxEntry: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

Name: Mr. Mime
PkdxEntry: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

Name: Scyther
PkdxEntry: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

Name: Jynx
PkdxEntry: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

Name: Electabuzz
PkdxEntry: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

Name: Magmar
PkdxEntry: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

Name: Pinsir
PkdxEntry: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

Name: Tauros
PkdxEntry: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

Name: Magikarp
PkdxEntry: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

Name: Gyarados
PkdxEntry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

Name: Lapras
PkdxEntry: A POKéMON that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

Name: Ditto
PkdxEntry: Capable of copying an enemy’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

Name: Eevee
PkdxEntry: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

Name: Vaporeon
PkdxEntry: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.

Name: Jolteon
PkdxEntry: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000-volt lightning bolts.

Name: Flareon
PkdxEntry: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

Name: Porygon
PkdxEntry: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

Name: Omanyte
PkdxEntry: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

Name: Omastar
PkdxEntry: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

Name: Kabuto
PkdxEntry: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

Name: Kabutops
PkdxEntry: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

Name: Aerodactyl
PkdxEntry: A ferocious, prehistoric POKéMON that goes for the enemy’s throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

Name: Snorlax
PkdxEntry: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

Name: Articuno
PkdxEntry: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

Name: Zapdos
PkdxEntry: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

Name: Moltres
PkdxEntry: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

Name: Dratini
PkdxEntry: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

Name: Dragonair
PkdxEntry: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

Name: Dragonite
PkdxEntry: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

Name: Dragonite
PkdxEntry: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

Name: Mewtwo
PkdxEntry: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

Name: Mew
PkdxEntry: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
